name: Eduardo Castillo
bio: Eduardo Castillo, a dazzling right winger from Mexico, is known for his blistering pace and impeccable dribbling skills. His signature move—a feint followed by a curling left-footed shot—often leaves defenders in the dust. With a fierce competitive spirit, Eduardo brings a vibrant energy to Yucatán Force, embodying the passion and heritage of the Mayan heartland.
